H0.text: Penguin is an animal whose color allows it to blend into its environment.

H1.text: Squirrel is the animal whose color allows it to blend into its environment.

H2.text: Cardinal is the color of an animal that allows it to blend into its environment.

H3.text: Polar bear is an animal whose color allows it to blend into its environment.

A4.text: Their light fur provides camouflage in their snowy environment.
